title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions: Elevate your eye makeup game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. This highly pigmented, matte eyeshadow stick is perfect for creating a soft, light taupe-pink look that lasts all day. With its waterproof and crease-proof formula, this eyeshadow stick is a must-have for any makeup lover. Plus, the added benefits of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax ensure that your delicate skin stays nourished and protected. No need for brushes - the built-in smudger allows for easy application and blending. Get your hands on this versatile eyeshadow stick today and take your makeup routine to the next level!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for creating a stunning light taupe-pink look. With a matte finish and a waterproof, crease-proof formula, this eyeshadow stick is a must-have for your makeup collection.

Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only enhances your look but also nourishes and protects your delicate skin. Suitable for sensitive skin, this eyeshadow stick offers antioxidant protection and improves skin tone and texture.

No need for any additional tools - this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger for easy application. Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, blend with the smudger or your fingers, and enjoy long-lasting, vibrant color. Don't miss out on this versatile eyeshadow stick that offers a range of finishes and shades to choose from. Upgrade your makeup routine with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick today!
